timeline.message:
lint changes/fixes

- configure lint for the crowdin process
  - add 'ExtraTranslation' ignore rule in build.gradle for runtime check
  - add 'ExtraTranslation' ignore rule in lint.xml for lint check
  - remove 'MissingQuantity' ignore check
  - remove 'ImpliedQuantity' ignore check
  - edit 'UnusedQuantity' ignore check to all files

- add some unused images (png/xmk) to the ignore list

- add 'ObsoleteLintCustomCheck' ignore rule
  These warnings are only for external sources

- remove 'InvalidPackage' ignore rule for runtime check
  This is fixed in the meantime

- delete some ' UnusedResources' strings
  see https://ci.cgeo.org/job/cgeo%20pull%20request/3872/androidLintResult/type.-2046836529/package.-963969145/

timeline.bodyText:
Can we set the ignore flag for external libraries only?
Otherwise we would switch it off for our own code, too, which I'd like to avoid.
BTW: spelling is "typically"
timeline.author: moving-bits
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -10,6 +10,9 @@
     <!-- false positives for return values of RxJava subscribe() calls -->
     <issue id="CheckResult" severity="ignore" />
 
+    <!-- avoid outdated lint warnings typicly from external libraries -->
+    <issue id="ObsoleteLintCustomCheck" severity="ignore" />
+

replies.bodyText:
We do not use custom lint checks in c:geo, so there is no problem for the normal checks.
See https://ci.cgeo.org/view/Continous%20integration/job/cgeo%20continuous%20integration/3047/androidLintResult/type.-1692134117/
Will fix the typo :-)
replies.author: bekuno
